About

I am currently working as an AI Researcher at SBS, driving innovation and pushing the boundaries of artificial intelligence. Working at a content creation company brings a unique joy, as I get to see firsthand how AI can enhance storytelling and production. My focus lies in advancing AI technologies that leverage video, exploring new ways to analyze, generate, and enhance visual content. Beyond research, I deeply value the opportunity to collaborate with professionals from diverse fields—ranging from engineers and designers to producers and artists—fostering interdisciplinary communication that fuels creative and technical breakthroughs.
